text: This creature’s name starts with C. It is the fastest land mammal and can run up to 70 miles per hour.
This creature’s name starts with Y. It can live at 20,000 ft above sea level.
This creature’s name starts with L. It  weighs 470 pounds more than a Cheetah.
This creature’s name starts with B&W. It is the largest mammal on earth.
This creature’s name starts with K. It gets most of the water from the leaves it eats.
This creature’s name starts with C. It can lift six times its own weight.
